Group II This group of four lakes follows the current of the main chain of lakes and includes the largest and deepest lake of the Osterseen Lake District, Lake Grosser Ostersee, which is 2. 15 km long and 0. 83 km wide with a maximum depth of 29 m. The lakes in this group are less influenced by groundwater sources.
